sourcesContent: import*as e from"react";import{isString as o}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{isAlreadyTyped as a}from"./types.mjs";const s=({fields:s,modelName:r,schema:t})=>e.useMemo((()=>{if(a(s,t))return s;const e={};return Object.keys(s).forEach((a=>{var i,l,m;const n=s[a];switch(null===(m=null===(l=null===(i=null==t?void 0:t.models[r])||void 0===i?void 0:i.fields)||void 0===l?void 0:l[a])||void 0===m?void 0:m.type){case"AWSTimestamp":case"Float":e[a]=Number(n);break;case"Boolean":e[a]=Boolean(n);break;case"Int":e[a]=o(n)?parseInt(n):n;break;default:e[a]=n}})),e}),[s,t,r]);export{s as useTypeCastFields};
